abstract: The automaker has not competed in the FIA World Endurance Championship since 1999.
snippet: The automaker has not competed in the FIA World Endurance Championship since 1999.
lead_paragraph: On Friday, Toyota announced that its motorsports division in Germany, the same unit that set a lap record for electric vehicles on the Nürburgring in August, would develop a hybrid racecar to compete on the 2012 FIA World Endurance Championship circuit, including the 24 Hours of Le Mans.

headline.main: Toyota to Return to Le Mans in 2012 With Hybrid Racecar
